casebody.data:
HAARHUIS
v.
CHEEK 332P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2017 *523Stephanie W. Anderson, Walter K. Burton, Attorneys at Law, Greensboro, Cam Bordman, Attorney at Law, New Orleans, LA, for Cheek, Emily. J. David Stradley, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Leto Copeley, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Haarhuis, Joris (Administrator)

Robert P. Holmes, IV, Attorney at Law, Raleigh.

Meghan Wray Deutsch-Blanco, Attorney at Law.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of October 2017 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dismissed without prejudice by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of October 2017."
